verdict.bottomLine: Elai.io is best for teams that want 1080p avatar videos with a simple web workflow. The trade-off is usage limits: free exports are watermarked, monthly minutes expire without rollover, and commercial/refund terms need careful review. User reports suggest rendering can be slow and avatar expressiveness is limited compared to competitors.

faqs.question: Do Free plan videos have a watermark?
faqs.answer: Yes—watermark-free videos are stated as available for paid accounts. That implies Free plan outputs include a visible watermark.

faqs.question: What export resolution does Elai support?
faqs.answer: Pricing states Creator exports 1080p Full HD and Team supports 4K Ultra HD. Free/Creator 1080p vs Team/Enterprise 4K is plan-dependent.

faqs.question: Do unused minutes roll over month to month?
faqs.answer: No—official plan documentation says unused minutes expire at the end of the billing cycle. If rollover matters, monthly subscriptions may feel wasteful.

faqs.question: How do annual plans handle minutes?
faqs.answer: Official documentation says annual subscriptions receive all minutes upfront. That can fit users who need bursts of production rather than steady monthly use.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faqs.answer: Yes—help docs describe canceling via profile settings under Manage Subscriptions. Effects timing (immediate vs end-of-term) needs verification.

faqs.question: What's the refund policy?
faqs.answer: Terms do state paid services can be cancelled without refund in specific misuse cases. Clear consumer-friendly refund window needs verification from official terms.

faqs.question: Is Elai allowed for commercial use?
faqs.answer: The terms excerpt provided grants a license for personal, non-commercial use. Whether paid plans grant commercial rights needs verification from official Elai documentation.

faqs.question: What stock media is included?
faqs.answer: Pricing indicates access to a variety of royalty-free images, videos, icons, and shapes. Specific providers need verification from official docs.

faqs.question: What format do exported videos download as?
faqs.answer: MP4 downloads are reported by third-party sources. Official Elai confirmation for MP4 export wording needs verification.

faqs.question: Do I need a powerful computer to use Elai?
faqs.answer: Elai is presented as web-based and only requires a computer and internet connection. Specific hardware/RAM recommendations are not confirmed.

faqs.question: Why do some users complain about slow rendering?
faqs.answer: User reports: even short videos can take several minutes to render in some tests. Expect variability and plan buffer time for deadlines.

faqs.question: How expressive are the avatars (gestures/movement)?
faqs.answer: User reports: avatars may have limited gestures and mostly neck-up movement. If you need body language, test your target style before committing.
